messages: 6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (08:48): nah!  I try to be humble  :)
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (08:53): god I Love my nintendo DS
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (09:06): how do you handle upgrades to blender in it?
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (09:06): on gentoo I would just compile my own blenders, just wondering whether its best ignoring the repositories and installing new versions manually
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:11): I do cvs and DL installs
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:11): repository could be an old version :)
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (09:12): its 2.41 on dapper, but 2.42 is due
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (09:12): I'll rip out the repository version and do my own
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:13): I use cvs quite a bit so I don't worry too much about repository versions :)
db46f8136a05cd1404e74d500129a05e (09:22): I swear im never going to be happy with organics
db46f8136a05cd1404e74d500129a05e (09:22): I can draw it but damn if I can make my model look like it
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:22): Microsoft broke Volkswagen's world record: Volkswagen only made 22 million bugs!   <-  I like that one     :)
db46f8136a05cd1404e74d500129a05e (09:24): the only way I can get my shape right is subdividing to death
db46f8136a05cd1404e74d500129a05e (09:24): or making my mesh a total mess
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:26): could always do like I seem to do, make one really big super subdived one and then build a plane over it after you have it looking good
db46f8136a05cd1404e74d500129a05e (09:26): build a plane over top of it?
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:27): start with a plane delete everything but 1 vert then redo the shape in as little verts as possible
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:29): I am working on icons for my game  :)
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:29): [Relic]: what, you don't like a wooden, gridded monkey?
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:30): You realize that's actually fairly trivial.
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:31): I'm about to hit the sack tho
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:31): and make it reflecty and put it next to 5 or 6 other heads in a circle  :)
6bdf4521165fe0d0fae23a0112289d95 (09:31): have to keep you looking like you are busy doing something useful  :)
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:32): I was actually just looking at the array modifier
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:32): and thinking about exactly how I would go about using it.
dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:33): Because I can do it use of two ways

dbacf1e91861351d2616728069e9baad (09:33): I need to hit the sack
7ee0f04e12eff05193ab953ececc9f9e (09:36): why is everyone so mean to the sack?
4c180a4ce4d9ab38948688b4d5dac4c5 (09:40): to get rid of an animation and start a new one, can i just erase all the actions?
4c180a4ce4d9ab38948688b4d5dac4c5 (10:04): nope, about to head to bed
4c180a4ce4d9ab38948688b4d5dac4c5 (10:07): it just takes practice i guess
4c180a4ce4d9ab38948688b4d5dac4c5 (10:09): you can also hold down, i think shift to get perfect lines
4c180a4ce4d9ab38948688b4d5dac4c5 (10:10): i bought a tablet, its easier to draw, but it dosnt give you talent or skill like alot of people think
e65f444b3ac536a0f4741da90ca617c1 (10:13): Talent, who needs talent? I've got advanced mathematicst to my photo realism.
e65f444b3ac536a0f4741da90ca617c1 (10:13): Although it's made my brain melt.
